message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which is worth $1200000 to you, is being offered to you at a special price of $950000. I believe this offer presents a unique chance for you to secure an asset that could significantly benefit you in the long run. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions or provide further details about the product. Looking forward to your positive response.
